author: Alan Staton
content:
1st time here, what I hear you cry, well it won't be my last, quality food served and very reasonably priced only Â£10 for rice and 3 curries, 1 Roti and a bottle of water, where in the city centre can you get that, and we sat inside.
This place has been going years, there's a different set of curries everyday so you can plan which day you want to visit.
